hadiths.text: Aishah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "When one of you is sleepy and he is performing Salat, then let him lie down until the sleep is gone from him. For when one of you performs Salat while he is sleepy, perhaps he wants to seek forgiveness but he curses himself

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ النُّعَاسِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Salat When Sleepy
